mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.id_card AS "idCard", a.name AS "name", a.phone AS "phone", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.idcard_img AS "idcardImg"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_wx_user( id, id_card, name, phone, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, idcard_img ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{idCard}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{idcardImg} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_wx_user SET id_card = #{idCard}, name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, idcard_img = #{idcardImg} WHERE id = #{id}
